name: Full Day Cham Island Discovery Tour From Hoi An
description: Cham Island, with its cool climate, clean white sand beaches, transparent water and plentiful protected marine habitatshas attracted many tourists recently. The Cham Archipelago (Cu Lao Cham) in the East Sea, 10 nautical miles from Cua Dai Beach, can easily be visited via private daily toursfrom Hoi An.
